entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • There needs to be a proper "new, unique" value number for exception sets #63559
    7.0.0
  • NullabilityInfoContext does not report the correct nullability for method in generic base class. #63555
  • Double quotes are escaped as \" in New JsonConsole #63554
  • `object.GetType` needs to have an exception set #63553
    7.0.0
  • `Dns.GetHostAddressesAsync` gets stuck on Windows #63552
  • Inject RegexGeneratorAttribute by source generator #63551
    7.0.0
  • JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull is not work as my expect when Serialize a JsonDocument #63550
  • Developers can use Generic Math without enabling preview features #63548
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose Buffer.ZeroMemory, add "modern" MemoryCopy overload #63547

Closed

  • Inefficient codegen using `for` instead of a simple `while`-loop #63544

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] Convert RuntimeAssembly icalls to use QCallAssembly/ObjectHand… #63558
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Fix paramName in CryptoStream ArgumentExceptions #63557
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix NullabilityInfoContext.Create to properly analyze types with nested generic types #63556
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Remove leading and trailing white-spaces from section name #63549
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Use static abstract interface methods in SymbolicRegexMatcher #63546
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Merged

  • [metadata] Borrow bits from MonoClassField:parent for flags #63302
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Webpack & NextJS & TypeScript samples #63335
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1543911 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix non-portable coreclr arm64 build #63121
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • Fix Regex if-then-else code generation #63427
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Add blsr #63545
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [draft] hot reload wip #63513
    area-EnC-mono
  • Improve auto-atomicity for conditionals #63299
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0-maui] Add back HAVE_SYS_ZLIB support #63359
    area-Build-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `System.Drawing.Graphics.NativeGraphics`. #63058
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable IDE0059 analyzer: Unnecessary assignment of a value #63340
    area-Meta
  • Exception sets: debug checker & fixes #63539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add the `coreclr/unwinder/loongarch64` from the #62979. #63489
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Added DrawRectangle overload accepting RectangleF #62385
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.StringLanguageAttribute #62995
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix hang in ArrayTests #63528
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Use C# 10's enhanced struct initialization features #63131
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Improve auto-atomicity for Regex loops #63518
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
